word: But there are many who have had no personal labor. Words of kindly instruction have not been spoken to them. It is time that unselfish, consecrated workers entered families who have accepted the truth but who have not worked for its advancement. It is time that our preaching brethren ministered not only to the congregation but to families.--Ms. 65a, 1898. ("Words of Instruction to Ministers and People," May 22, 1898.)
